MasterAnswered on 03 Sep 2018It's always about affordability.If you can afford to upgrade to Standard Plan under the insurers, please consider.Medishield Life can only account for 90% of all hospital (subsidised bills) for hospitalisation.The Standard Plan upgrade will cover up to 99% of all bills. And it's quite affordable. Medisave will cover the deductible and co-insurance.If you are looking at better healthcare, non-subsidised, then it will cost a lot more.0 comments0
